name: Catch the red guy if you can
name_original: Catch the red guy if you can
description:
Try to catch the red guy if you can! Only the spot light can reveal where's the red guy. Your score will count how many times you catch him in one minute.

A game in 558 characters of code for TweetTweetJam 5

This game was made for #TweetTweetJam and contains only 558 characters of code, including art. The code is below:

z,w,f,m,g,h=mid,rnd,122,64,24414,0pal({1,13,7,13,8},1)::s::x,y,s,t,p=m,m,0,60,{}for i=1,m do p[i]={x=w(f),y=w(f),a=w(),t=10}end::_::cls(c)t-=1/30 c,b=0,btn()x+=(b&2)/2-(b&1)y+=(b&8)/8-(b&4)/4x,y=z(x,127),z(y,127)poke(g,255)circfill(x,y,32,1)poke(g,238)for i=1,m do q=p[i]u,v=q.x+cos(q.a),q.y+sin(q.a)q.t-=1 if(q.t<0)q.a,q.t=w(),w(m) if u==z(u,f)and z(v,f)==v then q.x,q.y=u,v else q.a=w()end ?"웃",q.x,q.y,i<2and 4or 2 end if(pget(x,y)>3)s+=1 c,q=1,p[1]q.x,q.y=w(f),w(f) if(t<0)goto s ?"s:"..s.." h:"..h.." ⧗:"..flr(t),4,4,10 pset(x,y,8)h=max(s,h)flip()goto _
